properties.headline: Flood Warning issued January 19 at 9:23AM CST until January 20 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Jackson MS
properties.description:
...The Flood Warning continues for the following river in Mississippi...

Chickasawhay River At Shubuta affecting Clarke County

The Flood Warning continues for
The Chickasawhay River At Shubuta
* until Monday afternoon.
* At 6:00 AM Sunday the stage was estimated at 30.5 feet.
* Minor flooding is forecast.
* Flood stage is 30.0 feet.
* Forecast...The river is cresting at 30.5 feet, and will then
begin falling.
* Impact...At 30.0 feet...Minor flooding over the right bank of the
river.
properties.instruction:
Do not drive or walk through areas where water covers roadway! The
water may be deeper than it appears. Remember...Turn around, don't
drown!

Please note that forecast crests are based upon rainfall that has
occurred along with forecast rainfall for the next 24 hours. River
forecasts in the Tombigbee River Basin have an additional 48 hours of
rainfall added. Rainfall amounts greater than forecast may take the
rivers higher.


Additional information is available at:
https://water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN

The next regularly scheduled update is expected tonight between 8 and
10 PM.

NWSheadline: Flood Warning extended until Monday afternoon
